content: knit teddy bear tee shirt monicarose51 designs fits a teddy bear 15 to 17 inches in height supplies needles size 4 and size 6 stitch markers four yarn dk or light worsted approx 20 grams abbreviations k knit round round kf&b knit front and back of next stitch sts stitches pm place maker sm slip marker note tee shirt is knit from the neck down with smaller needles cast on 64 stitches join in the round knit four rnds of k1p1 ribbing change to larger needles round 1 set-up for increases k7 kf&b pm k2 kf&b k10 kf&b pm k2 kf&b k14 kf&b pm k2 kf&b k10 kf&b pm k2 kf&b k7 72 sts round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 *knit to one stitch before next marker kf&b sm k2 kf&b** repeat from * to ** three more times k to end of round 80 sts rnds 4 - 17 repeat rnds 2 & 3 increasing eight sts each odd numbered round until you have 136 sts round 18 k18 k1p1 ribbing on next 32 sts k36 k1p1 ribbing on next 32 sts k18 round 19 k18 cast off 32 sts in k1p1 ribbing k36 cast off 32 sts k18 72 sts round 20 k18 cast on 2 sts k36 cast on 2 sts k18 76 sts rnds 21 - 27 knit or to desired length rnds 28-30 work k1p1 ribbing cast off in ribbing weave in ends
